price: Hakika tumekiteremsha katika usiku ulio barikiwa. Hakika Sisi ni Waonyaji.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tumeanza kuiteremsha Qur'ani katika usiku ulio jaa kheri, wenye baraka nyingi, kwani ni mwendo wetu kuonya kwa kuwatuma Mitume na kuteremsha Vitabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
